      • checkEncodingProblems

        public void checkEncodingProblems()
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Try to find encoding problems by reading the whole file with the concluded encoding (if no conflicts detected). This only checks whether a conclusion about UTF-8 encoding can be justified.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getProblemInfo

        Returns:
